title: Melissa King
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with Chef Melissa King, who is recognized as one of the best female chefs in San Francisco and was the winner of Top Chef All-Stars season 17, and Top Chef All-Stars Fan Favorite.They discuss the power of Top Chef, the importance of supporting the queer community, and taking an unconventional route to becoming a chef.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
